title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 10.7 - Taking fish with bows and spears
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 10.7 - Taking fish with bows and spears

State Regulations
(a) The taking
of fish by spear is prohibited in all waters. Possession of spears is
prohibited on all waters. (b) The
taking of fish by bow is prohibited in all waters except as specifically
permitted in this section. Fish permitted to be taken with a bow may be taken
at any size and in any number. (c) Longbows may be used to take carp from May 15th through September 30th from any
waters of the State where fishing, the harvest of carp, and the discharge of a
bow is permitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

10.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
